mapper.update:
update ad_app_modules
MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_DESC = #{moduleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PROVIDER = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ad_app_modules set MODULE_CODE = #{moduleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_DESC = #{moduleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CODE = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_MODULE_CODE = #{parentModuleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_URL = #{mobileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_LEVEL = #{moduleLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_ORDER = #{moduleOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t1.MODULE_CODE id,t1.MODULE_NAME name,t1.PARENT_MODULE_CODE pId, case when module_code in(select t2.module_code from sm_role_module t2 where role_code=#{roleCode}) then true else false end 'checked' from (select m.*,e.company_code,p.package_code from sm_package_module p left join es_company e on e.packagecode=p.package_code left join ad_app_modules m on m.module_code=p.module_code where m.MODULE_CODE is not null
) t1 where t1.company_code=#{companyCode} order by t1.MODULE_CODE
select t1.*, t2.module_name as parent_module_name from ad_app_modules t1 left join ad_app_modules t2 on t1.parent_module_code = t2.module_code order by t1.module_code
select t1.*, t2.module_name as parent_module_name from ad_app_modules t1 left join ad_app_modules t2 on t1.parent_module_code=t2.module_code where t1.rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
